aba.a: xi0 aba “(dialectal) elder sister, mother” < ef1 *ap-pa “mother, elder sister, aunt” in sp7.

abece.a: xi0 abece “alphabet” < a combination of the name of the first three letters in Turkish alphabet; xi0 a “alpha”, xi0 be “beta” and xi0 ce “gamma”.

çilimleşmek.a: xi1 çilimleş- “to smoking together” xi1, ek0 and ln3 çilim “hookah, cigarette, tobacco” (> and sometimes aa0 çılım “in a parallel sense”) > sf5 çilim “hookah”, th8 çilim or aa0 çilimçik “chewing tobacco”, xr9 çilem “pipe” < through vowel-consonant metathesis aa0 *içlim ≈ xu7 içilim “hookah” < sp7 *ičil- “(intransitive) to be smoked” + sp7 *-im See içilmek.
